messages.subject: body worlds
messages.msgSnippet: If you re going to be seeing the Body Worlds exhibit while it s in Chicago, you might be interested in ordering the teacher materials from MSI - it includes a
messages.messageBody:
If you're going to be seeing the Body Worlds exhibit while it's in Chicago,
you might be interested in ordering the teacher materials from MSI - it
includes a dvd that shows plastination preparation (including final positioning and
hardening of the horse and rider!) and a system by system exploration of the
exhibit. Sarah was weirded out about going to see the exhibit but is finding the
dvd content irresistible and will probably change her mind by the time we go.

to order the dvd fill out the form here (mine came in less than a week)
https://www.msichicago.org/secure/bw_teacher_materials.html

links to online resources
http://msichicago.org/bodyworlds/resources.html

Deborah in IL


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
